data.title: Program by Section
data.meta_description: CLAIFF24 Program   GET A BADGE FREE SCREENINGS $12 SCREENINGS     Venues: – AFS Cinema- 6259 Middle Fiskville Rd, Austin, TX 78752 – E ...
data.text:
Venues:

– AFS Cinema- 6259 Middle Fiskville Rd, Austin, TX 78752

– Emma S. Barrientos Mexican American Cultural Center (MACC)- 600 River St, Austin, TX 78701

– Nepantla, USA- Behind 1209 E Cesar Chavez St, Austin, TX 78702

Narrative Feature Showcase

Documentary Feature Showcase

Narrative Feature Competition

The works screened in this category are eligible for a Jury Award and Audience Award for Best Narrative Feature.

Documentary Feature Competition

The works screened in this category are eligible for a Jury Award and Audience Award for Best Documentary Feature.

Panorama Features

Hecho en Tejas Centerpiece Feature

Hecho en Tejas Competition

The works screened in this category are eligible for an Audience Award for Best “Hecho en Tejas” Film. This section is presented in partnership with the Texas Film Commission (TFC) and Texas Archive of the Moving Image (TAMI).

Showtime: June 12 at 1:30pm, AFS Cinema

Read more

Documentary Shorts Competition

The works screened in this category are eligible for a Jury Award for Best Documentary Short.

Showtime: June 12 at 12pm, MACC

Read more

Narrative Shorts Competition

The works screened in this category are eligible for a Jury Award for Best Narrative Short.

Showtime: June 12 at 3pm, MACC

Read more

Music Video Competition

The works screened in this category are eligible for an Audience Award for Best Music Video.

Showtime: June 11 at 8-10pm, Nepantla, USA

Read more

Femme Frontera Showcase

Showcase featuring works by women and non-binary filmmakers from the U.S.-Mexico border regions of El Paso, Texas, Las Cruces, New Mexico, and Cd. Juárez, Chihuahua, México.

Showtime: June 12 at 5pm, MACC

Read more

Title Director Everything is Blue Micaela “Mica” Burgess There Was Nobody Here We Knew Khaula Malik Kii Nche Ndusta (Time and the Seashell) Itandehui Jansen Viva Nos Queremos Saray Argumedo Mijo Mazdey Snob Nurture Ying-Fang Shen Folk Frontera Alejandra Vasquez Lullaby Khushee Hedge

Teach For America Showcase

A selection of films by youth and educators, all of which contribute to — and invite — dialogues about educational equity.

Showtime: June 11 at 4pm, MACC

Read more
